Room.Name: Cargo Hold
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the port side of the cargo hold of Captain Morgan's ship.
Room.LongDescription: Some of the cargo has evidently shifted during the years and there is a jumble of smaller kegs and containers blocking any further exploration in this direction. Some of these kegs look like they might still contain a high proof rum. Odd. Although the ship is eeriely clean, you see some strands of kelp floating before you.
